Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ḥry-wbḫt (Herywebkhet) with black painted detail: a lappet-wig tied with a black fillet, an unmodelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
